CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 1, 1964, pg. 7 reads: "Kappa Silhouettes - This attractive group is composed of the wives of members of Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity and are called Kappa Silhouettes. The charmers were hostesses at a Black and White Ball, last Friday night, at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton.  Left to right: Mmes. James Willis, Ralph Barnett, Robert W. Smith, James A. Stewart, president; Howard Thomas and Stafford Evans.  Back row: Mmes. John Smith, Alfred Carl, Marshall Johnson, James Greenlee, Andrew Turner, Robert Mungin Gregory Pitts, Leon Ford, Alma B. Davis, and Langston Lewis. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven Kappa Silhouette members, first row, left to right: unknown woman, Fran Turner, Ethel Stewart, Nancy Pitts, and Mrs. Alfred Carl; back row, left to right: Helen Smith and Harriet Thomas, standing in Penn Sheraton for Kappa Alpha Psi Black and White Ball
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity.Penn Sheraton Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
